tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am greatful to have known Dr.Deepika for my second pregnancy. My second pregnancy was not as easy as the first one. Dr. Deepika played a very critical role in making sure my  baby and I were safe. She is a very down to earth person with great professionalism.  She is very transperant in educating her patients on the issues and cares a lot for her patients. Her calmness in listening to every problem and guiding the patients in the right way with right treatment is just commendable. Most doctors would not really worry about their patients after the delivery. But, Dr. Deepika is one such person who really cares a lot for her patients and she still kept checking on my health post my delivery. I am really thankful to have known her and I really recommend her for new moms to be. Thank you Dr.Deepika for everything!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind review Preethi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My friend had recommended Dr Deepika for pregnancy check up. I would like to Thank doctor Deepika for consultation throughout my pregnancy. 
I consulted Dr Deepika from day 1 of my pregnancy till 8th month. She is very kind, friendly, listens to all our queries and explains each and every detail no matter how many times I ask the same questions. 
I was operated for Bartholin Cyst during 6th month of pregnancy. I was worried about baby. Dr Deepika made me understand that it will not cause any problem to baby. 

I have delivered Healthy baby girl. All Thanks to Dr Deepika for her support.
I recommend Dr Deepika.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback Manju

First of all I would say Thanks to Dr Deepika Alva for better and genuine treatment. We started consulting Dr. Deepika Alva for my wife's pregnancy at 4th month. She is extremely friendly and explains the details with very clearly with utmost care. She spends time and answers all our queries. And she explains in layman language to understand anyone.

Since we don‚Äôt have a possible situation for delivery in Bangalore, we have to plan in Hyderabad. For that she co-operated and guided us in friendly nature‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ most of the doctors don‚Äôt do that. Thanks you madam!!!
